src:
Melai sumunod kay Angel
06 Nov 2019, 10:39 by Aster Amoyo
HINDI man personal na naihatid (tulad ni Angel Locsin) ng ex-PBB Big Winner-turned actress-comedienne-TV host na si Melai Cantiveros ay nagpadala ito ng tulong sa mga kababayang nasalanta ng lindol sa Mindanao.
Si Melai ay taga-General Santos City at marami sa kanyang mga kababayan sa Mindanao ang naging biktima ng sunud-sunod na paglindol doon.
Sinu-sino pa kayang celebrities ang may ginintuang-puso ang tumulong nang kusa sa mga biktima ng lindol sa Mindanao tulad nina Melai at Angel?
Harinawa’y magkaroon pa ang industriya ng maraming tulad nila, lalo na si Angel, na consistent sa pagtulong sa mga biktima ng iba’t ibang kalamidad.
text:
Melai followed Angel
06 Nov 2019, 10:39 by Aster Amoyo
NOT personally delivered (such as Angel Locsin) by ex-PBB Big Winner-turned actress-comedienne-TV host Melai Cantiveros sent it to help the devastated people in the Mindanao earthquake.
Melai is from General Santos City and many of his countrymen in Mindanao have been the victims of a series of earthquakes there.
Who else has the golden-hearted celebrities who have helped themselves to earthquake victims in Mindanao like Melai and Angel?
Hopefully the industry will have more people like them, especially Angel, who is consistent in helping victims of various disasters.
